Articles.Content: I use Kerbal Joint Reinforcement... or I did. It's stopped working, I assume because of the new version. I prefer to fly rockets rather than slinkies.  Can anyone suggest an alternative mod that works with 1.4?

12 minutes ago, qoonpooka said:

I use Kerbal Joint Reinforcement... or I did. It's stopped working, I assume because of the new version. I prefer to fly rockets rather than slinkies.  Can anyone suggest an alternative mod that works with 1.4?

Maybe just wait a few days until it gets updated.

You could also use Autostruting
As I understand it, KJR is simply "autostrut all parts to their grandparent".
This discussion of add-ons has been moved to Add-on Discussions.
Just be patient, 1.4 has been out for like two minutes

What everyone else said: In the meantime, Editor Extensions has an "AS: Grandparent: All" button. Although I've noticed it seems to hit the physics engine mighty hard--Possibly on the order of N^2 calcs.
This mod still seems to work, and will automagically autostrut everything.
Some days I truly thank god that I am not a mod author. This week is one of those days.
For all reasonably sized rockets...  autostrutting the bottom stage engine to root and external boosters to heaviest is usually all I have to do.
Look in IR next WIP development thread. You will find there improved version of KJR while waiting for ferram to merge PR on github.
